remarks: The image structure of a ring is a ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
imasring.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasring.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasring.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
imasring.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
imasring.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) $.
imasring.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasring.e1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .+ b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .+ q ) ) ) ) $.
imasring.e2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. V /\ b e. V ) /\ ( p e. V /\ q e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` a ) = ( F ` p ) /\ ( F ` b ) = ( F ` q ) ) -> ( F ` ( a .x. b ) ) = ( F ` ( p .x. q ) ) ) ) $.
imasring.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
imasring $p |- ( ph -> ( U e. Ring /\ ( F ` .1. ) = ( 1r ` U ) ) ) $.
$d .+ p q $.
$d .1. p q $.
$d .x. p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d F a b p q $.
$d R p q $.
$d U a b p q $.
$d V a b p q $.
$d a b p ph q $.
